Interface IValidationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ValidationService
public interface IValidationService
Service interface for validation operations. Follows Interface Segregation Principle by providing a focused contract.

  • Method Details

    • validateNric

      boolean validateNric(String nric)
      Validates a user's NRIC format.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to validate
      Returns:
      true if the NRIC format is valid, false otherwise

    • validatePassword

      boolean validatePassword(String password)
      Validates a user's password.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the password is valid, false otherwise

    • validateMaritalStatus

      boolean validateMaritalStatus(String maritalStatus)
      Validates a user's marital status.
      Parameters:
      maritalStatus - The marital status to validate
      Returns:
      true if the marital status is valid, false otherwise

    • validateSingleApplicantAge

      boolean validateSingleApplicantAge(int age, String maritalStatus)
      Validates a single applicant's age.
      Parameters:
      age - The age to validate
      maritalStatus - The marital status
      Returns:
      true if the age is valid for a single applicant, false otherwise

    • validateMarriedApplicantAge

      boolean validateMarriedApplicantAge(int age, String maritalStatus)
      Validates a married applicant's age.
      Parameters:
      age - The age to validate
      maritalStatus - The marital status
      Returns:
      true if the age is valid for a married applicant, false otherwise

    • validateFlatTypeEligibility

      boolean validateFlatTypeEligibility(String flatType, String maritalStatus)
      Validates the flat type eligibility based on marital status.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room")
      maritalStatus - The marital status
      Returns:
      true if the flat type is eligible for the marital status, false otherwise

    • validateApplicantEligibility

      boolean validateApplicantEligibility(int age, String maritalStatus, String flatType)
      Validates an applicant's eligibility to apply for a project.
      Parameters:
      age - The age of the applicant
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the applicant
      flatType - The flat type (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room")
      Returns:
      true if the applicant is eligible, false otherwise

    • validateApplicationPeriod

      boolean validateApplicationPeriod(String openingDate, String closingDate)
      Validates a project's application period.
      Parameters:
      openingDate - The opening date of the application period
      closingDate - The closing date of the application period
      Returns:
      true if the application period is valid, false otherwise

    • validateFlatTypes

      boolean validateFlatTypes(String type1, String type2)
      Validates a project's flat types.
      Parameters:
      type1 - The first flat type
      type2 - The second flat type
      Returns:
      true if the flat types are valid, false otherwise

    • validateFlatUnits

      boolean validateFlatUnits(int units)
      Validates a project's flat units.
      Parameters:
      units - The number of units
      Returns:
      true if the number of units is valid, false otherwise

    • validateFlatPrice

      boolean validateFlatPrice(int price)
      Validates a project's flat price.
      Parameters:
      price - The price
      Returns:
      true if the price is valid, false otherwise
